alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 02 at 3:45PM AKDT until September 04 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The following area, Central Interior. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is occurring in low lying areas along the Tanana River from Delta to Nenana. In Fairbanks, from 6 to 10 inches of water is flowing over portions of Perkins Drive, Melanie Lane, and Chief John Drive. Several driveways and yards are inundated with water. High water is also occuring around the boat landing at Whitestone Farms near Delta Junction. Bankfull conditions are expected through Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 332 PM AKDT, Heavy rain that fell over the Alaska Range the past week is causing high water on rivers draining the Alaska Range, including the Delta and Tanana Rivers. Additional heavy rain in the Alaska Range Friday night will result in more runoff into the Delta and Tanana Rivers this weekend, and could cause further rises on the Delta and Tanana Rivers. - For those recreating or hunting on the Tanana and Delta Rivers, all gravel bars will be covered with water, debris will be in the river, along with increased erosion. Be cautious of rising water levels if you plan to park your vehicle near the river while out on your boat. - For Tanana River at Big Delta: Flood Stage is 23.0 feet. Forecast: A crest around 22.1 feet is expected around 10:00am Sunday. For the Tanana River at Fairbanks: At 3:15pm Saturday the stage was 24.5 feet. Flood Stage is 24.5 feet. Forecast: Steady river levels through Monday. - http://www.weather.gov/aprfc - If you live near or along the Tanana and Delta Rivers stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley
